name: Happy Honu
description: Happy Honu was inspired by the builders on this team who are all connected to Hawaii and want to highlight not only its ocean beauty, but the outside factors contributing to its harm. By playing this game, we hope to spread awareness of environmental issues in Hawaii by introducing ocean elements to avoid in each round of native and non-native predators (ocean debris, sunscreen, vana, etc.) for the main player, a sea turtle (honu).
